# 1944 Rutgers Queensmen football team

The 1944 Rutgers Queensmen football team represented Rutgers University in the 1944 college football season. In their seventh season under head coach Harry Rockafeller, the Queensmen compiled a 3â€“2 record and were outscored by their opponents 82 to 58.
